titleInfo.title: John B. Heroman, Sr. photograph collection. Postcards. Folder 01-03, between 1905 and 1935?

mods.abstract: Empty postcard album from folder 3 in box 1. Contains multiple small pictures on the inside cover. May have once held some of the postcards now stored in 91:3 Box 6.

titleInfo.title: John B. Heroman, Sr. photograph collection, circa 1885-1940

mods.accessCondition: Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright of the original material is retained in accordance with U.S. copyright laws. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: John B. Heroman, Sr. Photograph Collection, Mss. 4951, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.

extension.hardwareSoftware: Scanned on Expson XL11000 as 600ppi TIFF files; Converted to JPEG files using Adobe Photoshop; Converted to JP2 files with CONTENTdm software.
